member.name: T:webAPI.Controllers.BibliotecaController
member.summary: Wen api de gestion de Biblioteca

member.name: M:webAPI.Controllers.BibliotecaController.GetBiblioteca
member.remarks: It contains the list of all the books that our library of books has.
member.response: ok. Returns the objects requested(book) by the user
Not. found. The object requested by the user was not found

member.name: M:webAPI.Controllers.BibliotecaController.GetBibliotecaByID(System.Int32)
member.summary: List of books registered by id
member.remarks: The data is entered to enter a new book to our library
member.response: ok. Returns the objects(new book) requested by the user
Not. found. The object requested by the user was not found

member.name: M:webAPI.Controllers.BibliotecaController.PostBiblioteca(webAPI.Models.Biblioteca)
member.summary: new book registration for the library
member.remarks: It is a record of books by id as its name indicates, you should enter the id of the book to show the information of the book
member.response: ok. Returns the objects requested by the user
Not. found. The object requested by the user was not found

member.name: M:webAPI.Controllers.BibliotecaController.PutBiblioteca(System.Int32,webAPI.Models.Biblioteca)
member.summary: Book information update according to your id
member.remarks: As the book with its information has already been created in the other obsessions, this tab is used for its edition if we have made a mistake in something
member.response: ok. Devuelve los objetos solicitados por el usuario
Not. found. No se ha encontrado el objeto solicitado por el usuario

member.name: M:webAPI.Controllers.BibliotecaController.DeleteBiblioteca(System.Int32)
member.remarks: in this section the desired book is deleted by inserting its id
member.response: ok. the book that the user deleted is returned
Not. The id of the book that the user requested for deletion was not found
